page.title: 18RECREATION CRICKET ROD.GREEN
page.content: The cricket ground in Rodmersham Green is celebrating its centenary and is having a full week of cricket. The cricket club has played in King George the fifth recreation ground and Rodmersham. They have five acres of ground. They have three teams,which will be playing through their celebration week.There is a match every Saturday and Sunday.These are friendly matches,although they also play in the league,in which they are second to bottom.The cricket club is set at the far end of Rodmersham,about 250 yards from the squash club.Their grounds are also used for hockey.They have a pavilion which sells alcohol and food at every match.Teams 1 and 2 play on Saturdays and team 3 on Sundays.The first two teams play in the league but 3 are stand-bys.
